p: O-aminobiphenyl, decalin, palladium 10% on activated carbon (10% Pd/C) were purchased from Energy-chemical Company (Shanghai, China). Hydrazine hydrate and sodium nitrite (NaNO 2) were obtained from Aladdin Company (Shanghai, China). Sodium azide and concentrated sulfuric acid were purchased from Wuhan changcheng Chemical Technology Co., Ltd. (Wuhan, China). Potassium nitrate (KNO 3), sodium hydroxide (NaOH), sodium chloride (NaCl), absolute ethanol (EtOH), N-hexane, methylene chloride, ethyl acetate, N,N-dimethylformamide (DMF), and silica gel were obtained from Sinopharm Group Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd. (Shanghai, China). ODA and PMDA were purchased from Alfa-Aesar company (Shanghai, China). Before use, the PMDA was dried at 110 Â°C under vacuum for 6 h and DMF was purified by distillation under inert nitrogen atmosphere.
